name: Baobabs Mausoleum Ep.1: Ovnifagos Don´t Eat Flamingos
description: Baobabs Mausoleum™. Mixing Monkey Island, Zelda Link´s Awakening DX with Twin Peaks and SpongeBob Squarepants. Welcome To Flamingo´s Creek: Population 64.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1.5 GHz Core2Duo Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 1.4 or better Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Dedicated with 128 MB RAM Storage: 4 GB available space
